root.description: Customers who purchase Bientôt l'été on Steam gain the ability to play their license on Macs and PC's via Steam Play.System RequirementsWindowsMinimumRecomendedOS: Windows XPProcessor: 2 GhzMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: Geforce 7600, Radeon X1600Hard Drive: 500 MB HD spaceOS: Windows 7Processor: 3 GhzMemory: 3 GB RAMMacMinimumRecomendedOS: 10.6.8Processor: 2 GhzMemory: 2 MB RAMGraphics: Geforce 7600, Radeon X1600Hard Drive: 500 MB HD spaceOS: 10.6.8Processor: 3 GhzMemory: 3 MB RAM
